lead_paragraph: Kristin Armstrong could win her third straight Olympic gold medal in Rio. The women's pursuit team is favored to capture gold. Several Americans could land on the BMX podium.

headline.print_headline: USA Cycling at Crossroads as Rio Olympics Approaches
headline.main: USA Cycling at Crossroads as Rio Olympics Approaches
